question: Cloud Kicks (CK) switched to Lightning Experience and started using Chatter across its global workforce to support its fast-paced sales cycle. CK loves Chatter but struggle with gathering feedback from core team members, including understanding who is available to respond. Which two ways could CK use Chatter to solve this problem?
explanation: Out of Office allows users to show availability, and Polls are used for gathering team feedback[cite: 903, 913].

question: Sales reps at Cloud Kicks (CK) forget to submit for approval when CK needs orders reviewed before close won. CK wants to automatically submit opportunities into the Secure Commitment Stage to eliminate manual submission. Which two features could meet the business requirements?
explanation: An Approval Process handles the logic, and a Flow can trigger the submission automatically[cite: 930, 940].

question: Universal Containers has purchased a Lightning component on the AppExchange. In which two areas can these components be used?
explanation: AppExchange components are standardly used in the Lightning App Builder for pages and can be launched via Quick Actions[cite: 956, 962].

question: Universal Containers have changes that need to be deployed from Sandbox to Production. Where should an app builder look to verify that a Change Set can be deployed?
explanation: Deployment Status shows the progress and results of the deployment[cite: 980, 984].

question: An app builder installed a custom Lightning component from AppExchange. What should be done next in order to configure the component for use in a record page?
options: Edit a record page using Lightning App Builder > Drag the component onto the page.
Edit a record page using the Page Layout editor > Drag the visualforce component onto the page.
Edit a record page using App Manager > Drag the component onto the page.
Edit a record page using the Page Layout editor > Drag the component onto the page.
explanation: Lightning record pages are modified specifically through the Lightning App Builder[cite: 1000, 1001].

question: Sales representatives want to capture custom Feedback record details related to each Account. The sales reps want to accomplish this with minimal clicks on mobile. Which two solutions should be recommended in order to meet this requirement?
options: Create an object-specific action on Account.
Create a feedback object as a parent of Account.
Create a global action on Account.
Create predefined values for most of the fields.
explanation: Object-specific actions combined with predefined values reduce data entry time on mobile[cite: 1022, 1025, 1030].

question: The events manager at Cloud Kicks (CK) hosted a launch party and wants to add a CSV file of attendees into a Campaign as Campaign Members so CK can track any future purchases the guests make. Which three considerations should be made prior to using the Data Import Wizard for importing Campaign Members?
options: Related Lead, Contact, and Campaign records for the Campaign Members should exist prior to import.
The CSV should be properly formatted and deduplicated prior to insertion via the Data Import Wizard to maintain data cleanliness.
The Data Import Wizard should be accessed from the object home page or from personal settings since they are not System Administrator.
When importing Campaign Members to a campaign, status does not need to be selected because the default member status is 'Planned'.
Inserting new Campaign Members prohibits workflow rules and processes for any records that meet automation criteria.
explanation: Prerequisites for Campaign Members include existing records and formatted CSV data[cite: 184, 186, 188, 190].

question: Where can an app builder add components to the utility bar?
explanation: Utility bars are configured within the App Manager for each specific app[cite: 1044, 1050].

question: Ursa Major Solar (UMS) uses Cases to track customer complaints, an Issue_c object to represent known problems, and a Case_Issue_c junction object. Which access levels must be configured to allow UMS users to access Case_Issue_c records?
options: Read-Only access on Case and Case_Issue_c
Read-Only access on Case and Issue_c
Read-Only access on Issue_c and Case_Issue_c
explanation: Access to junction objects typically requires read access on both master records[cite: 1067, 1072].

question: Universal Containers has deployed custom tabs to production via change sets, without including the profile settings or permission sets. What is the setting for the visibility of custom tabs?
options: Custom tabs are default off for all users.
Custom tabs are hidden for all users.
Custom tabs are default on for all users.
explanation: Tabs deployed without profile metadata default to 'Default Off'[cite: 1091, 1094, 1103].

question: Universal Containers wants to embed a chart of all related Opportunities, by stage, on the Account detail page. Which type of report should an app builder create to add to the Account page layout?
options: A summary report on the Opportunity object
A tabular report on the Account object
A summary report on the Account object
A tabular report on the Opportunity object
explanation: A summary report on the related object (Opportunities) is required to generate a chart for a record page[cite: 1116, 1119].

question: Universal Containers uses a custom object called Projects. Once Estimated Hours are set, users should be able to decrease but not increase the value. How can an app builder meet this requirement?
options: Create a formula default value for the custom field.
Create a validation rule that uses the PRIORVALUE function.
Create a validation rule that uses the ISCHANGED function.
Create a formula field that uses the PREVGROUPVAL function.
explanation: PRIORVALUE allows comparison between the new value and the existing value in a validation rule[cite: 1135, 1137, 1141].

question: DreamHouse Realty (DR) has many properties for sale and wants to identify the highest value of all offer_c records on each Property_c record. Which solution should the app builder use to meet DreamHouse Realty's needs?
explanation: Master-Detail relationship is required to use a Roll-Up Summary field (MAX) to find the highest value[cite: 1157, 1159].

question: Northern Trail Outfitters wants to change a master-detail relationship on Account to a lookup relationship with a custom object Park. The app builder tries to reconfigure this but is unable to do so. What could be causing this?
options: The Account is included in a flow process on the Park object.
The Park object needs at least one Master-Detail field for reporting.
The park records have existing formulas on the Account.
The Account record includes Parks roll-up summary field.
explanation: You cannot convert a Master-Detail relationship to a Lookup if there is an existing Roll-Up Summary field[cite: 1176, 1178, 1184].

question: A manager built out a new Account report and wants to add a chart of the data to account records. An app builder tried to use the Report Chart component but was unable to find the manager's report. What are two reasons the app builder is unable to see the report?
options: The report has no data in it.
The app builder did not create the report.
The report is in the manager's Private Reports folder.
The report does not have a chart.
explanation: Reports must be in shared folders and must contain a chart to be visible in the component[cite: 1198, 1204, 1206].

question: Cloud Kicks asked the app builder to insert a list of 25,000 records using deduplication for the Delivery custom object. Which tool should be used?
explanation: The Import Wizard supports deduplication for custom objects up to 50,000 records[cite: 208, 212].

question: A new field has been added to the Applicant object. A recruiter noticed the new field was missing as an option in a custom report. How should an app builder troubleshoot this issue?
options: Update the profile with the Manage Public Reports permission.
Adjust the field level security to include in the report type.
Check Allow Reports for the position and applicant objects.
Add the field to the custom report type field layout.
explanation: New fields must be manually added to the field layout of a Custom Report Type[cite: 1221, 1227].

question: The Cloud Kicks (CK) sales team is planning a Salesforce mobile app rollout. Which two solutions could an app builder suggest for an enhanced user experience?
options: Allow mobile users to switch between Lightning and Classic.
Include Today as a navigation item in the app.
Set up different mobile menu configurations for different types of users.
Create a custom App Page and assign to the mobile menu.
explanation: The 'Today' feature and custom app pages enhance mobile productivity[cite: 1243, 1249, 1252].

question: On the Account Lightning record page, users need to see ten fields and the ability to sort and wrap text on their Related Lists. Which Related List type should the app builder select?
explanation: The Enhanced List type allows for more visible fields and sorting capabilities[cite: 1268, 1274].

question: What should an app builder do to upgrade an unmanaged package that has been installed into production?
options: Uninstall the current version and install the new version.
Install the new version to a Developer org then deploy to production.
Click the update link on the Installed Packages page.
Install the new version in a sandbox then deploy to production.
explanation: Unmanaged packages cannot be upgraded directly; they must be uninstalled first[cite: 1291, 1293].

question: Sales reps at Universal Containers create multiple quotes per opportunity. Which automation tool should an app builder recommend to delete rejected quotes?
explanation: Flow is the declarative tool capable of deleting records in Salesforce[cite: 1314, 1315].

question: An app builder is asked to create a sandbox for a developer testing 250 MB of data that needs daily refresh. Which type of sandbox should the app builder create?
explanation: Developer Pro Sandboxes support higher data limits (up to 1GB) and daily refreshes[cite: 1333, 1341].

question: Which two places can an app builder go to see a list of available Custom Lightning components in their org?
explanation: Lightning components are listed in Setup and available for drag-and-drop in the App Builder[cite: 1361, 1364, 1369, 1373].

question: Cloud Kicks (CK) requires that custom shoes are shipped within two weeks after the close date. How should the app builder ensure the Scheduled Ship Date field is properly filled out before setting the opportunity to closed won?
explanation: The formula validates that the date is not blank and within 14 days when stage is 'Closed Won'[cite: 1384, 1389, 1390].

question: An app builder wants to update a field on the parent record when a child record connected via lookup is deleted. Which automation should the app builder use?
explanation: A Record-triggered flow can run specifically when a record is deleted[cite: 228, 230, 236].

question: Nickname_c is a custom text field used to override the contact name. Which formula should an app builder use to select the preferred name if Nickname_c is not blank, otherwise use FirstName?
explanation: The IF statement checks if the nickname field is not blank[cite: 1410, 1415].

question: Which two features can be used to allow users to access Flows?
explanation: Flows can be launched by a Quick Action or triggered by other processes[cite: 1435, 1436, 1442].

question: Which tool should an app builder recommend to auto-populate a field on the Asset record when a maintenance work order gets closed?
explanation: Flow is the recommended declarative way to update related records upon field changes[cite: 1457, 1465].

question: A production org includes custom objects containing confidential information. A sandbox is needed that includes data records, excludes all confidential objects, and can be refreshed weekly. Which step should be taken?
options: Create a Developer Sandbox and schedule Data Loader to download selected object data weekly.
Create a Full Copy Sandbox and use a sandbox template.
Create a Partial Copy Sandbox and use a sandbox template.
Create a Developer Pro Sandbox and schedule Data Loader to download selected object data weekly.
explanation: Partial Copy Sandboxes allow weekly refreshes and the use of templates to exclude objects[cite: 1481, 1488].

question: Cloud Kicks (CK) wants all company employees to see conversations around customer accounts. Which two features of Chatter would meet CK's business needs?
options: Set up new private Chatter groups.
Use post action on the Account object.
Use Chatter actions to create tasks to complete.
Set up new public Chatter groups.
explanation: Public groups and account post actions ensure organization-wide visibility[cite: 11, 18, 22].

question: An app builder wants to reflect summarized calculations of specific fields. Which three field types can be used in roll-up summary fields?
explanation: Roll-up summaries support sum, min, and max calculations for these numeric and date types[cite: 38, 41, 48].

question: Universal Containers require different fields to be filled out at each stage of the Opportunity sales process. Which configuration steps can an app builder use to meet this requirement?
options: Create a Validation rule to prompt the User for field information.
Set page layout required fields based on the current stage.
Define record types and page layouts for each stage.
Add the Path component to the Lightning record page.
explanation: The Path component highlights key fields needed at each stage of a process[cite: 252, 257].

question: Universal Containers (UC) delivers purchased containers to remote construction sites. Which field type should the app builder use to capture crossroads or location markers?
explanation: Geolocation is specifically designed to store location coordinates[cite: 272, 276, 281].

question: Which two steps are necessary to make a custom Lightning App available to the internal users?
options: Build a Custom Tab for the app.
Add the app to a Visualforce page.
Upload the app to Static Resources.
explanation: Apps must be assigned to profiles and accessible via tabs to be used by users[cite: 295, 299, 301].

question: AW Computing uses a private sharing model for opportunities. Whenever an opportunity with a type of Service Agreement is created, all users in the Service Manager role should view it. Which tool should be used?
explanation: Criteria-based sharing rules grant access based on record values like 'Type'[cite: 321, 324].

question: Ursa Major Solar (UMS) wants to allow the same applicant to apply for multiple open positions using a single application. What should an app builder recommend?
options: Create a master-detail relationship field on Open Position to Application.
Create a master-detail relationship field on Applicant to Application.
Create a master-detail relationship field on Application to Open Position.
Create a master-detail relationship field on Applicant to Open Position.
explanation: An application object as the child in a Master-Detail relationship with Open Position allows multiple applications[cite: 343, 348].

question: Universal Containers uses a custom picklist on the Account object. The VP of sales asked that the value of this field is visible on Opportunities. How should an app builder create this solution?
explanation: Cross-object formulas can display parent (Account) fields on child (Opportunity) records[cite: 364, 370].

question: Sales reps want recommendations, sales strategies and to know what key fields need to be completed at each step of the sales process on the opportunity record. Which feature should be used?
explanation: Path provides visual guidance and key fields for each stage of a record[cite: 64, 67, 75].

question: Which three common items can an app builder move when using a change set?
explanation: Custom objects, fields, and code (Apex) are deployable via change sets[cite: 390, 394, 397, 398, 402].

question: Universal Containers wants to track installation information on a custom object for purchased containers. Which kind of relationship should this new object have to Opportunity?
explanation: Master-Detail ensures the child records are deleted with the parent and share security[cite: 411, 415].

question: New cases populate a green circle, day-old cases a yellow circle, and three day-old cases a red circle. How should an app builder implement this?
explanation: Formula fields can display images based on conditional logic[cite: 90, 94, 98].

question: Which two actions should the app builder take to prevent users in the shipping department from deleting delivery records?
options: Remove the delete button from the Delivery page layout.
Change the organization-wide default of deliveries to Private.
Use a permission set to remove the Delete permission
Remove the Delete permission from the Shipper profile
explanation: Profile and permission set settings directly control object-level delete permissions[cite: 118, 125, 128].

question: Only users with the Outer Planets profile need to see the Jupiter field on the Solar System object. How should the app builder satisfy this requirement?
explanation: Field-level security controls field visibility for specific profiles[cite: 433, 437].

question: How should Cloud Kicks grant scorecard access to reps, managers, and executives while preventing reps from seeing executive comment fields?
options: Use a private sharing model granting record access using hierarchy; manage field access with record types and field-level security.
Use a private sharing model granting record access using custom settings; manage field access with page layouts and field-level security.
Use a private sharing model granting record access using hierarchy; manage field access with field-level security.
Use a private sharing model granting record access using custom settings; manage field access with record types and page layouts.
explanation: Role hierarchies grant record-level access, while FLS controls field-level visibility[cite: 457, 464].

question: New vendors must accept terms on agreements before the opportunity can be closed. Which feature should be used?
explanation: Validation rules prevent saving a record if specific conditions (terms accepted) aren't met[cite: 481, 483].

question: CK changed processes to allow opportunities to have different specialty values than their Account. How can reps enter values while preserving existing ones?
options: Export the data, convert the field to a text field, and import the data.
Convert the field to a text field and the values will be in it.
Create a new text field and keep using the existing formula field.
Create a new text field and import the formula field values in it.
explanation: Importing existing formula values into a new text field preserves historical data[cite: 502, 508].

question: Cloud Kicks wants to display the number of Opportunity records associated with each Account. Which solution should be used?
explanation: Roll-up summaries (COUNT) on the Account object can aggregate related Opportunities[cite: 523, 525, 529].

question: Universal Containers (UC) requires that all users specify a contract is sent on each Opportunity prior to marking it as 'Closed Won'. Which field type should be configured?
explanation: A checkbox is the simplest field for tracking binary conditions for reporting[cite: 543, 546].

question: Cloud Kicks would like to track when customers made their first purchase. How should an app builder use a roll-up summary to meet the requirements?
options: Create a new date field called First Order Date, then create toll- summary to update the field using Type MIN.
Create a new roll-up summary field called First Order Date, using Type MIN on the Opportunity Close Date with a filter where IsWon = TRUE.
Create a new date field called First Order Date, then set the date using a roll-up summary on Opportunity Close Date.
Create a new roll-up summary field called First Order Date using Type SUM on Opportunity Close Date.
explanation: MIN on the Close Date of 'Won' opportunities identifies the first purchase date[cite: 567, 572, 573].

question: Cloud Kicks (CK) is creating an approval process for overnight shipments. Where should the app builder route the approval request?
explanation: Requests can be routed to a Public Group to ensure department members can approve[cite: 596, 603, 608].

question: Universal Containers wants a user to answer additional questions via a popup window to populate additional record fields when submitting for approval. What should be used?
explanation: A Flow launched by a button can collect user input and perform record updates[cite: 618, 620, 623].

question: The VP of Sales asked the app builder to let sales reps create opportunity records directly from the account, with pre-populated fields. Which feature should be used?
explanation: Quick Actions on the Account object allow for easy record creation with default values[cite: 637, 640].

question: A new app builder wants to see how standard objects and custom objects relate. Which functionality should the app builder use?
explanation: Schema Builder provides a visual representation of the data model[cite: 658, 661].

question: Ursa Major Solar wants to see the Type field from parent Galaxy on child Star. Which formula should be used to avoid picklist function errors?
explanation: TEXT() converts picklist values into strings for use in other fields[cite: 142, 148].

question: When an opportunity close date is delayed by more than 60 days, review is required. Which two solutions will meet the requirement?
options: Create a flow that submits the record for an approval process.
Create a formula field that calculates if the close date is less than 60 days and then send an email alert.
Build an approval process that requires unanimous approval from the manager and VP of Sales.
Build a validation rule that does not allow a user to save the opportunity record.
explanation: The combination of Flow and an Approval Process automates the required review[cite: 681, 684, 687].

question: Which approach should an app builder take to show Component as a related list on Product?
options: Create a master-detail relationship on Product to Component.
Create a junction object to relate Component and Product.
Create a lookup relationship on Component to Product.
explanation: A lookup field on the child object creates a related list on the parent object[cite: 165, 169].

question: What should the app builder do to meet a deadline for a customized survey solution with little time to build from scratch?
options: Work with a developer to create custom Apex code and Visualforce survey.
Build the survey declaratively and use a workflow rule to send it.
Select an unmanaged package from AppExchange that allows programmatic development.
Choose a managed package from AppExchange that restricts programmatic development.
explanation: Unmanaged packages provide a pre-built base that can be further customized[cite: 705, 713].

question: After testing, changes had to be made to components in a change set already deployed to testing. How should the builder move new changes?
options: Refresh the test sandbox and re-deploy the change set.
Clone the change set and re-deploy.
Rename the change set, add the changes and re-deploy.
Update the change set and re-deploy.
explanation: Cloning is the standard way to modify and resend a Change Set[cite: 732, 734, 736].

question: The app builder is unable to implement a Roll-Up Summary field on Account for Opportunity amounts. Why?
options: The default currency is not an active currency.
Currency fields are unable to be referenced in Roll-Up Summary fields.
The organization has Advanced Currency Management enabled.
Roll-Up Summary fields are unavailable on the Account object.
explanation: Advanced Currency Management restricts Roll-Up summaries on Opportunity amount fields[cite: 753, 755, 759].

question: A business user wants a quick way to edit status and custom due date from the record's feed in Salesforce Mobile App. What should be used?
explanation: Custom actions enable record updates directly from the record feed[cite: 776, 783].

question: Universal Containers wants to improve Opportunity creation from an Account where many fields are pre-populated. What should be configured?
options: Assignment rule triggered from Opportunity update
Quick Action on the Opportunity object
Quick Action on the Account object
Assignment rule triggered from Account update
explanation: Quick Actions on a parent object allow pre-populating fields on a new child record[cite: 798, 806].

question: In a master-detail relationship, what determines the ownership and sharing access of the detail record?
options: The Owner field on the Master record.
The owner is set independently on the detail object settings.
The Owner field on the Detail record.
The default owner is set in the parent object's settings.
explanation: Detail records inherit ownership and security from the Master record[cite: 823, 825].

question: Which next steps ensure users can access new object and fields created in Schema Builder?
options: Add the fields to the page layout on the object.
Allow reporting for the object and fields.
Create a permission set for access to the object and fields.
Assign data types to the fields on the object.
explanation: Users need both field-level access (Permission Set) and UI access (Page Layout)[cite: 841, 843, 846].

question: DreamHouse Realty wants to prevent cases from being reverted to earlier status and ensure certain fields are required based on criteria. Which solution?
options: Create dependent picklist fields and set them as required.
Configure validation rules with help text.
Make the fields required on the page layout.
Use an approval process to check field criteria are met.
explanation: Validation rules can enforce logical constraints and conditional requirements[cite: 864, 870, 877].

question: An app builder needs to create new automation. Which best practice should be followed?
options: One record change process per object
explanation: Standard best practice is to consolidate automation into one Flow per object to control execution order[cite: 886, 888].
